comment:
Appearance: Amber colour with pink tinge
Clear Opacity
No sediments
Viscosity medium 

Nose: intensity medium plus 
Youthful age
Used bourbon and red wine barrels 
Malt grain
No smoke
Cinnamon, nutmeg, vanilla, caramel, butterscotch, honey, raisins, 
Caramelised pears, orange flesh, lemon zest, peaches, banana 

Palate: sweet, medium plus alcohol, medium body, 
Texture is creamy, round, rich but delicate.
Bourbon and butterscotch dominate.
Medium plus finish.
Medium plus complexity
